successes.title: Rhino Slider for DSLR Cameras
successes.description: Get amazing cinematic video with a GoPro, iPhone, DSLR or RED. The most affordable, ultralight and versatile 48" slider ever.

Pledges.description: For a buck we'll give you $2 in love. Double your money. That's a huge return on investment, think about it.

I'm a T-Shirt snob. I love tri-blend shirts. I want you to experience them too. Along with getting a killer premium Rhino tri-blend shirt, you are grafted into our team of supporters AND you get a sweet Rhino Sticker. Cool huh? Add $5 for international shipping. (Men's sizes only S-M-L-XL)

Learn from my mistakes reward. I have gained a tremendous amount of technical and industry knowledge over the last year. Receive a PDF document and a ~30 min video with me sharing EVERYTHING I've learned. This includes a list of of my suppliers, how I designed the Rhino Slider in CAD, how I selected my materials, coatings, supply chain management, shipping, etc. I would have paid thousands of $$ for this last year if I knew what I was in for :)

Early Bird Award. Help get the ball rolling! You get one of the first seventy five 48" Rhino Sliders with stainless steel tubular rails at $125 OFF retail price. US shipping is free, international add $65.
You get a 48" Rhino Slider with stainless steel tubular rails at $100 OFF retail price. US shipping is free, international add $65.
You get a 48" Rhino Slider Carbon with braided carbon fiber rails at $100 OFF retail price. US shipping is free, international add $65.
You get a 48" Rhino Slider PRO with solid stainless steel rails and center mount at $125 OFF retail price. US shipping is free, international add $65.
